thread.title: BRIEF-Northern Trust Says Chairman Waddell's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $11.9 Mln Vs $11.2 Mln In FY 2016

title: BRIEF-Northern Trust Says Chairman Waddell's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $11.9 Mln Vs $11.2 Mln In FY 2016
text: Market News March 8, 2018 / 2:13 PM / in 15 minutes BRIEF-Northern Trust Says Chairman Waddell's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $11.9 Mln Vs $11.2 Mln In FY 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 8 (Reuters) - Northern Trust Corp: * NORTHERN TRUST CORP SAYS CHAIRMAN FREDERICK WADDELL’S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $11.9 MILLION VERSUS $11.2 MILLION IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING * NORTHERN TRUST CORP SAYS CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER, MICHAEL O’GRADY‍​'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $5.3 MILLION VERSUS $3.9 MILLION IN FY 2016 Source text: ( bit.ly/2G4ebyF ) Further company coverage:
